alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 3:45PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF BEDFORD...BLAIR...AND HUNTINGDON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 345 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was near Hollidaysburg moving east at 45 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Martinsburg around 350 PM EST. Royer around 355 PM EST. Shy Beaver and Entriken around 400 PM EST. Trough Creek State Park and Dudley around 405 PM EST. Rockhill Furnace and Mount Union around 425 PM EST. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 11 to 26. This includes the following highways... Route 22 near near Mapleton. Route 220 from near King on I-99 to near Newry on I-99. Route 522 from Shade Gap to Mount Union. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
